nodes.text: Umbarese, also called Umbaran, was the primary language of the Umbaran species native to Umbara. It had a written form.

Umbarese first appeared in "Darkness on Umbara," the seventh episode of the fourth season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which aired on October 28, 2011. The language was later first identified in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying Game products.
